<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 7:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#a9579881de06b1560d242d15171ca1b86">LLVM&#95;FALLTHROUGH</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 6:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">    b |= ((uint64&#95;t)ni&#91;5&#93;) &lt;&lt; 40;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#a9579881de06b1560d242d15171ca1b86">LLVM&#95;FALLTHROUGH</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 5:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">    b |= ((uint64&#95;t)ni&#91;4&#93;) &lt;&lt; 32;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#a9579881de06b1560d242d15171ca1b86">LLVM&#95;FALLTHROUGH</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 4:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">    b |= ((uint64&#95;t)ni&#91;3&#93;) &lt;&lt; 24;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#a9579881de06b1560d242d15171ca1b86">LLVM&#95;FALLTHROUGH</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 3:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">    b |= ((uint64&#95;t)ni&#91;2&#93;) &lt;&lt; 16;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#a9579881de06b1560d242d15171ca1b86">LLVM&#95;FALLTHROUGH</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 2:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">    b |= ((uint64&#95;t)ni&#91;1&#93;) &lt;&lt; 8;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#a9579881de06b1560d242d15171ca1b86">LLVM&#95;FALLTHROUGH</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 1:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">    b |= ((uint64&#95;t)ni&#91;0&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">  v3 ^= b;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (i = 0; i &lt; cROUNDS; ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="#abd545ba6d36990ee5903ff4d0e6edecf">SIPROUND</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">  v0 ^= b;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (outlen == 16)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">    v2 ^= 0xee;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">    v2 ^= 0xff;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (i = 0; i &lt; dROUNDS; ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="#abd545ba6d36990ee5903ff4d0e6edecf">SIPROUND</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  b = v0 ^ v1 ^ v2 ^ v3;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a46eee35129898d0466b2af97eacb19ee">endian::write64le</a>(out, b);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (outlen == 8)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  v1 ^= 0xdd;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (i = 0; i &lt; dROUNDS; ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="#abd545ba6d36990ee5903ff4d0e6edecf">SIPROUND</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">  b = v0 ^ v1 ^ v2 ^ v3;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a46eee35129898d0466b2af97eacb19ee">endian::write64le</a>(out + 8, b);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end anonymous namespace</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Compute an ABI-stable 16-bit hash of the given string.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                0x6f, 0xec, 0x8b, 0x1b, 0x42, 0x87, 0x81, 0xd4&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t RawHashBytes&#91;8&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a155c6d528429c339eb352bfe2a715fe7">getSipHash&#95;2&#95;4&#95;64</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1b144823e66f38f789fb4909c29b8bec">arrayRefFromStringRef</a>(Str), K, RawHashBytes);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t RawHash = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a0fa2f859066acd16820ab083040158c9">endian::read64le</a>(RawHashBytes);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Produce a non-zero 16-bit discriminator.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint16&#95;t Discriminator = (RawHash % 0xFFFF) + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;ptrauth stable hash discriminator: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a41972fe6f3fab862543b7b835a714f9b">utostr</a>(Discriminator)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">             &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; (0x&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">             &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3beda524b0772ca36035db4399a6a571">utohexstr</a>(Discriminator, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;Lowercase=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;Width=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight">4)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">             &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;)&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">             &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; of: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; Str &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Discriminator;</span></CodeLine>
